reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 281/15: ACCIDENT AND SICKNESS INSURANCE - GENERAL
reg_info.act_under: Insurance Act   Loi sur les assurances

content.section: Access to group insurance documents: prescribed information
content.content: 1. The following information in a policy of group insurance or a policy of creditor’s group insurance is prescribed for the purposes of clause 293 (8) (b) of the Act: 1. Information in the policy that, if disclosed, would reveal confidential commercial information that a reasonable person would think could harm the competitive position of the insurer or the insured. 2. Information in the policy that, if disclosed, would reveal plan design and benefits information relating to a different class of group person insured or debtor insured than the group person insured or debtor insured to whom or in respect of whom the disclosure is being made.
content.raw_html:
1. The following information in a policy of group insurance or a policy of creditor’s group insurance is prescribed for the purposes of clause 293 (8) (b) of the Act:

1. Information in the policy that, if disclosed, would reveal confidential commercial information that a reasonable person would think could harm the competitive position of the insurer or the insured.

2. Information in the policy that, if disclosed, would reveal plan design and benefits information relating to a different class of group person insured or debtor insured than the group person insured or debtor insured to whom or in respect of whom the disclosure is being made.

content.section: Access to group insurance documents: prescribed information
content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).

content.section: Access to group insurance documents: prescribed information
